# About this booklet

## About the author
This booklet is created by [Duong Pham](https://polisci.ucsd.edu/grad/current-students/index.html), a Ph.D. student in Political Science at University of California, San Diego.

[My personal website](https://www.duongtpham.com/)
[Follow me on Twitter](https://twitter.com/home)

## About the booklet
In this booklet, you will find:
- Reading lists, annotated bibliographies, as well as essays for a wide array of topics spanning the two political science sub-fields: **(1) International Relations** and **(2) Comparative Politics**.
- My notes for matters related to research methodologies, including recommended self-study resources (online courses, videos, webpages, etc.), personal notes for methods classes' lectures, recommended tools, etc.
